headline: Views on Bolton Flip as Democrats Aim for His Testimony
abstract: Democrats who once derided him now want him to testify at President Trump’s impeachment trial while some of his erstwhile Republican friends are throwing him to the curb.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Not long ago, they called him “too extreme,” “aggressively and dangerously wrong” and “downright dangerous.” They called him “nutty,” “reckless” and “far outside the mainstream.”
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
